sys_properties.description: This property stores the JSON configuration for defining checklists and their items for catalog tasks. The JSON structure includes country-specific and catalog item-specific checklists, detailing the name, order, and mandatory status of each checklist item. This configuration is used by the ChecklistCreator Script Include to dynamically generate and manage checklists for catalog tasks in ServiceNow.
sys_properties.name: x_916860_autocklst.catalogTask.checklists
